message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1500000. This is a fair price considering its value and potential. I'm confident you'll find it to be a great investment. Let me know your thoughts.
Alice, your offer is significantly higher than my budget.  I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $800000 at this time.  Let me know if you're willing to consider that price.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $800000 is significantly lower than my asking price, I'm willing to negotiate further. I can offer you the product for $1100000. This price still reflects the value I place on it, but it also acknowledges your budget constraints.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Alice,  I understand your position, but $1100000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $900000.  This would be a good deal for both of us, as I'm ready to purchase right now.  Let me know if you're willing to accept this offer.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $900000 is still quite a bit lower than my desired price.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $1000000.  This price reflects the value of the product while acknowledging your budget limitations. This is my final offer.
